featuredRepos.name: tradingview-scripts
featuredRepos.description: This repository contains a collection of Pine Script indicators and strategies for TradingView, focusing on technical analysis and value investing principles.

featuredRepos.name: kohld.github.io
featuredRepos.description: This public portfolio website, built with Next.js and styled using Tailwind CSS, showcases projects and skills. It features a streamlined local build process and leverages TypeScript, JavaScript, and CSS for a robust and modern presentation.

featuredRepos.name: zenith
